text: Get RID! is the second album by Robots in Disguise. Tracks include the single "Turn It Up", a song composed mainly of references to other songs and, "La Nuit", sung entirely in French. ==Track listing== ===United Kingdom track listing=== ===France track listing=== #"Girl" – 3:18 #"She's a Colour Scientist" – 2:56 #"Hot Gossip" – 3:51 #"The DJ's Got a Gun" – 5:45 #"Voodoo" – 3:38 #"You Really Got Me" (Ray Davies) – 2:28 #"Turn It Up" – 3:54 #"Mirror rorriM" – 3:40 #"La Nuit" – 4:03 Category:2005 albums Category:Robots in Disguise albums
title: Get RID!
